data.message: Dear slim i poped 2 pills now the light in the room is getting Dim im so relaxed i fell in a pool ugh fuck i cant swim any way im glad you recovered but im still hooked on downers and  klonipins why bother even postín this shit cuz nobody gives a shitt!!!!

replies.message: It's not that nobody cares, so much as no one can free you except you.  Thing is, once those demons get inside you, they eat you up, soul and all.  And even after you go to hell and back to get them out - they will always be a whisper in your ear.  Glad you didn't drown.  Every day can be a new beginning.  As Christopher Robins said, "...you're braver than you believe, stronger than you seem and smarter than you know..."
